headline: Monolithic Power (MPWR) Eyes Robotics and Automation – AI the Next Big Thing

headline: Baird Q4 2024 Mid Cap Growth Strategy Commentary
summary: For the quarter, the Baird Mid Cap Growth portfolio produced a negative return of -1.3%, net of fees, trailing the Russell Midcap Growth increase of +8.1%.
